title: Geospatial Module
description: Defines the metadata elements that are specific to geospatial data, for example information about how position is encoded and data quality descriptions such as datums and positional accuracy.

errorMessage.if: Resources with types of dataset, tile, coverage, or map must meet metadata specifications for Geospatial resources.

required.resourceLineage: Geospatial processing steps should be documented in Lineage.

items.title: Extent
items.description: Describe where the data is located and what it pertains to.

geographicElement.title: GeoJSON Objects
geographicElement.errorMessage: At least one geoJSON object (vector feature) is required for  each Geographic Extent.

required.boundingBox: A Bounding Box is required for each Geographic Extent.
required.geographicElement: A geoJSON(vector feature) footprint is required for each Geographic Extent.

required.description: A description(top level summary or overview of the geographical information relevant to the dataset) is required for each extent.

spatialReferenceSystem.title: Spatial Reference Information
spatialReferenceSystem.description: Information about the coordinate-based system used to represent locations on the surface of the earth (or outside the earth).

required.extent: At least one extent is required.
required.spatialResolution: Spatial Resolution information about the appropriate map scale for display of the data is required.
required.spatialReferenceSystem: Spatial Reference System information is required.
